alert.note: Alert for Dallas (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 04 at 10:27PM CDT until April 04 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN DALLAS COUNTY... At 1026 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Farmers Branch, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Dallas, Garland, Irving, Grand Prairie, Carrollton, Richardson, Rowlett, Wylie, Coppell, Farmers Branch, University Park, Sachse, Addison, Highland Park, Cockrell Hill and Buckingham. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for north central Texas. For your protection stay inside a sturdy structure and keep away from windows. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately.
